channel.title: Need help i'm not good in this things !@@!
channel.description:
[size=10pt][b]uuh im a newb in this so this are my questions..
how i edit shops?...
how i change a required lvl to wear something?..
how i make new commands and let them work exactly?..
how i change the attack option of whip so that those of shared xp give, strength xp give?..
how i add duel arena?..
how i edit the status of a armour ?..
how i change the drops of a monster?..
how i change teleports?..
how i change the name of the client?..
how to creat a portal for monsters and where the portal is going?..
how i change drops rate?..
somethings i see null.. in my server like dfs and bandos boots, how i change them ? to get the exact thing.. ?
how i add correct d claws ?..
how i add correct d plate ?..
it's a 377 ddspeced source.. :D and based on delta i think.. ;D :P
i need a good tut. with everthing explained ;D[/b][/size]

item.title: Need help i'm not good in this things !@@!
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

Ok well when you say “edit shops” I’m guessing you mean add items ect. You can do this by going to you’re shops.cfg file, normally located under a folder called “config”. Once you’ve opened the file you will see something like this : -

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item---- 2 2 1050 10 35 10 6587 10 6570 10 6577

Mine looks a bit messy but it’s really self-expalantory. To edit an item change the item ID and the amount to whatever suits you. Or you can just add you’re own item at the end of the list following this same layout.

You can add a duel arena by using the search menu.

An easy way to change teleports is to log into you’re server and click the teleport you want to change. Then type in “mypos” which will give you the co-ords of the teleport spot. Now just search for that in you’re clicking.java and change the coordinates to you’re new position, agan using the “mypos” command.

Ok, not awnsering anymore but use the search button.

Read full topic
